A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing is the best I can say. Plot holes and weak characters surround this film and leave the viewer with so many questions un-answered the only question I now ask is why I wasted my time with this at all. If you are a casual viewer that has not grown up on this movie franchise then I am sure you will love it. But if you value the Star Wars saga at all\, this movie is the biggest let down ever.
